Detailed Description

Describes one overview map in the system.

A overview looks almost the same as an ordinary map, but with with following exceptions: {description} [Included items] Only municipals and built up areas are included. In the future also bigger lakes, forests etc. will be included. [Large roads] In the overview map only the StreetSegmentItems at the highest three levels (according to the GDF-file) are included. There are no small roads, no areas, no companies, no categories etc. [Translation table] To make it possible to translate the IDs in this overview map, to the true ID in the base map, there is one translation table in this overview map. {description}

Definition at line 47 of file OverviewMap.h.

Create a new OverviewMap.

The map is { not} filled with data from the file. This must be done by calling the load()-method after creation.

Parameters:

path Path to map to load.

Item* OverviewMap::addGroupItem (  Item *  nameItem,
ItemTypes::itemType  groupItemType,
set< Item * > &  items
)  [private]
 

Creates and adds a group item for grouping admin areas in overview map.

Sets the new group item as group to the items in the parameter items.

nameItem The item to pick the names. from. Typically one of the items in the items parameter. groupItemType The type of the group item to create. items The items to group with the new group item.

Returns:
Returns the new group item if successful, otherwise NULL.

bool OverviewMap::ssiConnectedToOverviewRoundabout (  GenericMap *  theMap,
const int  maxZoomLevelStreetSegmentItems,
StreetSegmentItem *  ssi
)  [private]
 

Help method to addMap() used to check if a certain streetsegmentitem is connected to a roundabout that is added to the overviewmap.

This check is performed in order to make sure that all exits of a roundabout are added, since the turndescriptions will be incorrect otherwise.

Parameters:
theMap The map containing the items.
maxZoomLevelStreetSegmentItems The maximum zoomlevel of the streetsegmentitems that are added to the overviewmap.
ssi The ssi that should be checked if it has any connections to a overviewmap roundabout.
Returns:
True if the ssi was connected to a overviewmap roundabout, false otherwise.

Member Data Documentation

Vector OverviewMap::m_containingMaps [private]
 

Vector with ID of the maps that is located on this overview.

Definition at line 270 of file OverviewMap.h.

Referenced by containsMap().

const byte OverviewMap::maxZoomLevelForMapLevel[] [static]
 

Vector specifying the maximum zoomlevel that should be included in the overview map given the maplevel of the overview map.

Note that index 0 of this array is invalid, since an overview map must be of maplevel 1 or higher (maplevel 0 means underview map). The overview map lowest in hierarchy has maplevel 1, the second lowest has maplevel 2 etc.

Definition at line 67 of file OverviewMap.h.

Referenced by existsOnLevel().

const int OverviewMap::maxZoomLevelStreetSegmentItems = 4 [static]
 

The maximum zoomlevel for streetsegments to be added to the overviewmap.

Used by this class to when adding and the RouteModule for knowing what low level is.
